common.name: Name
common.errorLoadingContent: An error occurred while loading this content. Please try again or reload the page.

auth.loginGenericError: Error signing in. Please try again.
auth.registerLoginError: Account created, but there was an error signing in. Please try signing in manually.
auth.registerGenericError: Error creating account. Please try again.
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password
auth.emailSentDesc: If an account exists with the email {email}, you will receive instructions to reset your password.
auth.confirmEmail: Make sure you entered the correct email
auth.resetPasswordSuccessDesc: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
auth.invalidLinkDesc: This recovery link is invalid or has expired.
auth.linkExpired: The link has expired (valid for 1 hour)
auth.linkUsed: The link has already been used
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.preferencesHint: You can change this later in settings

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.chartDescription: Financial evolution chart showing income and expenses for the period of
dashboard.wealthChartDesc: Wealth evolution chart showing total wealth, balance, investments, goals and debts
dashboard.categoryChartDesc: Pie chart showing expense distribution by category
dashboard.scoreExcellent: Excellent! Your financial health is great.
dashboard.scoreGood: Good! You're on the right track.
dashboard.tipSavingsRate: Try to increase your savings rate to at least 20%
dashboard.tipCreditUsage: Reduce credit card usage to less than 30% of the limit
dashboard.tipEmergencyFund: Prioritize building an emergency fund of 3-6 months
dashboard.tipDiversification: Diversify your investments across more asset classes
dashboard.tipBudgetAdherence: Review your budgets - you're spending beyond what you planned
dashboard.deleteTransactionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the transaction "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

transactions.addNewTransaction: Add a new income or expense

investments.title: Investments
investments.subtitle: Track your portfolio
investments.quotesUpToDate: Quotes are already up to date
investments.deleteInvestmentConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? All related operations will be removed. This action cannot be undone.
investments.assetNamePlaceholderFixed: E.g.: CDB Nubank 100% CDI, Treasury Selic 2029
investments.allocationChartDesc: Pie chart showing investment allocation by asset type.
investments.dividendsHint: Record dividends, interest on equity and other earnings in your investment operations
investments.updateCurrentPrice: Update with the current asset quote
investments.updateCurrentBalance: Update with current balance including earnings
investments.insightLowDiversificationDesc: Consider investing in more asset classes to reduce risk
investments.insightGoodDiversificationDesc: Your portfolio is well distributed across different classes
investments.insightRebalancingDesc: Some assets are outside the target allocation
investments.roundedNote: * Value rounded down (whole shares or available fraction)
investments.insufficientBalanceDesc: You need {needed} but only have {available} available.
investments.minDeposit: Minimum {symbol} 1.00. New operations can only be registered from this date.
investments.existingInvestmentDesc: Check this option if you already had this investment before using the system. The amount will not be deducted from your balance.
investments.noBalanceDiscountDesc: Check if the operation was already done outside the system or if you don't want to affect your account balance.
investments.yieldSimHint: Click "New Operation" and register a deposit to see the yield simulation.

cards.title: Credit Cards
cards.subtitle: Manage your invoices
cards.deleteCardConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the card "{name}"? All purchases and invoices will be removed. This action cannot be undone.
cards.selectCardToView: Select a card to view the invoice
cards.deletePurchaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.
cards.chartDesc: Bar chart showing invoice forecast for the next 6 months.
cards.addCardAndPurchase: Add a card and make a purchase
cards.alertInvoiceDueIn: Invoice due in {days, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}
cards.alertInvoiceClosesIn: Invoice closes in {days, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}

goals.title: Financial Goals
goals.removeGoalConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this goal? All contribution history will be lost.
goals.basedOnExpenses: Based on your expenses of {amount}/month, we recommend a reserve of:
goals.targetDateHint: Used to calculate how much to save per month
goals.depositInfo: The amount will be subtracted from your balance and added to the goal
goals.withdrawInfo: The amount will be taken from the goal and added to your balance
goals.insightDeadlineApproachingDesc: "{name}" is due in less than 30 days
goals.insightIncreaseContributionsDesc: {count, plural, one {# goal needs} other {# goals need}} more contributions
goals.insightOnTrackDesc: {count, plural, one {# goal is} other {# goals are}} on pace for completion

budget.title: Monthly Budget
budget.startBudgeting: Click "New Budget" to start managing your spending.
budget.removeBudgetConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this budget? This action cannot be undone.
budget.newBudgetSubtitle: Set a monthly limit by category
budget.allCategoriesBudgeted: All categories already have a defined budget.
budget.fixedBudgetHint: Apply this limit every month automatically

recurring.title: Fixed Expenses
recurring.subtitle: Manage your monthly recurring expenses
recurring.removeExpenseConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this fixed expense? Already posted transactions will not be affected.
recurring.dueDayHint: The expense will be posted on this day every month

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Detailed analysis of your finances
reports.barChartDescription: Bar chart comparing income and expenses for the last 3 months.
reports.chartDescription: Pie chart showing distribution of {type} by category.
reports.insightSpendingUpDesc: Your spending on {category} increased by {percent}% in recent months
reports.insightSavingsFoundDesc: You reduced {percent}% on {category} in recent months
reports.insightFastPaceDesc: Your projected spending is {percent}% higher than last month
reports.insightControlledPaceDesc: Your projected spending is {percent}% lower than last month
reports.insightSpendingPatternDesc: You spend more on {dayKey}, representing {percent}% of your weekly spending

privacy.deleteAccountWarning: All your data will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
privacy.pinConfiguredDesc: Your PIN is configured. It will be requested when you try to disable discrete mode.
privacy.pinNotConfiguredDesc: Set up a PIN to add an extra layer of security to discrete mode. Unlike your account password, the PIN is exclusively for protecting the display of your financial data.
